title: cmd/6g: go build eating all memory in a 512 MB of RAM machine with no swap
body:
by **toni@tcardenas.me**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Run `go install` in a ~10 kLOC package in a 512 MB of memory with no swap environment.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

8g.

Which operating system are you using?

Linux.

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version devel +bb2db1e233b2 Sun Aug 25 23:50:44 2013 +1000 linux/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.

The output when trying to `go install` is just `go build [...]: signal: killed`

Find attached the dmesg log.
Attachments: 1. dmseg.txt (7404 bytes)
